Publish.LongDescription:
# Private alpha for Platter.
## Disclaimer: This is an experimental, potentially unstable release. Expect issues and bugs, not everything may work as it should. Always backup your saves. Use at your own risk.
## Please report any issues and share feedback on Discord. Include the following logs:
- `%localappdata%low\Colossal Order\Cities Skylines II\logs\Platter.log` - `%localappdata%low\Colossal Order\Cities Skylines II\logs\Player.log`
Publish.ChangeLog: A lot of polish and bug-fixing in this one, plus a whole new corner lot detection system! - *New road connection tracking system* - Parcels now track not just front, but side road connection (for corner lots) - Parcels will now show missing road connection icon before being plopped. - Fix: Parcels at 8.45m-8.41m from the road would sometimes indicate they are connected to the road when they shouldn't be. - *New parcel object visuals*: - Overhauled parcel overlay. - The parcel overlay now accurately matches the parcel's actual size. (Overlay was 0.5m larger) - Parcel overlay now shows whether a parcel is connected to a road on each side. - (internal) Fix incorrect node positions. - *Improved building verification tooltips* - Fixed: Building total was counting level 2+ and corner buildings. Now only counts level 1 buildings and tracks fronting/corner buildings separately. - Added new tooltip providing corner building information. - *Fix*: Fixed relocate button causing all buildings to become parcels when placed, and sometimes causing a crash. - Include latest translations. - Internal: Add changelog system.
